Name: Slime with a Sword
About the game: Slime with a Sword is a high score based game where you attempt to collect coins by completing your lawn maintenance duties while surviving waves of enemies. Key Features: Arcade-Style High Score Board Speed Run Timer Pixel Art Aesthetic
